channel.title: How do I disable Paralyze Monster in a certain area?
channel.description: I made a area in point.java and i'm trying to figure out how to disable the paralyze monster just in the specific area, can anyone help me out? - thanks

item.title: How do I disable Paralyze Monster in a certain area?
item.dc:creator: @Jessekinss Jessekinss
item.description:
@Jessekinss wrote:

[quote=“yong min, post:14, topic:313050”]I don’t recall crying about a name.

That would be “Yong”.

That is all that got said previously. You then started it. I am not even going to waste my time posting back after this, you’re not worthy of my time.

Especially when you do this in EVERY topic.[/quote]

yong min:

“Young” is also used within names of Koreans, so if you are doing it to cause a reaction, sorry, you failed.

yong min:

As for not caring about spelling my name correctly, illiteracy is a common thing in this day and age, don’t worry about it.

I started it by saying “I don’t care for your name”? I don’t think so kiddo.

That’s what you said 2 posts up. Yet you came back. I suggest you just quit while you’re behind kid.

item.title: How do I disable Paralyze Monster in a certain area?
item.dc:creator: @Jessekinss Jessekinss
item.description:
@Jessekinss wrote:

Don’t care for your name, and the way I suggested is more efficient I suspect. Hence the way Reines does it for everything. Go look at why dueling is like that.

if(player.getLocation().inPkArena() && prayerID == 12) { player.getActionSender().sendMessage("Paralyze monster is disabled."); player.getActionSender().sendPrayers(); return; }

http://img257.imageshack.us/img257/2858/screenshot1vs.png

Read full topic
item.source: How do I disable Paralyze Monster in a certain area?

item.title: How do I disable Paralyze Monster in a certain area?
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

[quote=“Jessekinss, post:7, topic:313050”]Put it at the top.

if(player.getLocation().inTest() && prayerID == 12) { return; }

@Young min, what the hell were you thinking?[/quote]

That would be “Yong”. I wrote it there quick lol. Didn’t test or anything.

There are more than one way to write this and make it work.

Also, it would be need returning false.

Find:

private boolean activatePrayer(Player player, int prayerID) {

Under that, add:

		if(player.getLocation().inTest() && prayerID == 12) {
			player.getActionSender().sendMessage("Paralyze monster is disabled.");
    			return false;
		}

Read full topic

item.title: How do I disable Paralyze Monster in a certain area?
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

Try:

if(player.getLocation().inTest() && player.isPrayerActivated(12)) {
deactivatePrayer(player, 12);
player.getActionSender().sendMessage("Paralyze Monster is disabled.");
player.getActionSender().sendPrayers();
return false;
}

Read full topic
item.source: How do I disable Paralyze Monster in a certain area?

player.getActionSender().sendMessage(“Paralyze Monster is disabled”);

player.getActionSender().sendPrayers();
return; [/code]

item.title: How do I disable Paralyze Monster in a certain area?
item.dc:creator: @bloodyp2p bloodyp2p
item.description:
@bloodyp2p wrote:

I added this in prayerhandler :

[code]if(player.getLocation().inTest()) if(player.isPrayerActivated(12)) {
deactivatePrayer(player, 12);
player.getActionSender().sendPrayers();
player.getActionSender().sendMessage("Paralyze Monster is disabled ");

player.getActionSender().sendPrayers();
return; [/code]

But I can still use paralyze monster just when I turn paralyze monster off I get the message “Paralyze Monster is disabled”
